ModMetaData.name: Project RimFactory Revived
ModMetaData.author: zymex
ModMetaData.description:
<size=24>Incompatible mods:</size> - Mend and Recycle (only on assemblers) - Technology Blueprints & Reverse Engineering (t3 miner bill option)
This is our remake of Project RimFactory, it's an overhauled version of a great old mod by spdskatr. We have expanded on original ideas and tried adding some more story to it.
Also, try balance and stay in line with vanilla and other mods on the workshop, without going too OP. Or too far. (we have sub-mods for that.... :p)
We hope you enjoy this mod, if you need more info check out our steam page, github page or join our discord. We are also working on a wiki on our discord for more info on how stuff works.
